question.title: how to add Mono<String> from loop to List<String>
question.body:
have written reactive application using springboot-3.x,webflux and need to add String from Mono to List inside for loop.

have implemented below code:

Flux<Mono<String>> IdFlux = Flux.empty();
matchesByComp.keySet().parallelStream().forEach(key -> {        
        Mono<String> IdMono1 = reactiveRedisOperations.get(key,id);
        IdFlux.concat(IdMono1);

});

From above code again unable to convert Flux<Mono<String>> IdFlux to List<String>.
